scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && node index.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && xcopy /E /I /Y "dist\*" "..\backend\public\prod\"
scripts.build-dev: cd frontend && npm run build-dev && xcopy /E /I /Y "dist\*" "..\backend\public\dev\"
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "cd backend && node index.js" "cd frontend && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ." --kill-others --success first
